title: Flippy the Burger Flippin' Robot
description:
This week, Meredith and Patton talk about Flippy the burger flipping robot, daily crossword puzzle records, zoom etiquette, and more!

Have something interesting you want to share? Email us at HeyDidYouGetMyText@gmail.com, or leave us a voice message at speakpipe.com/didyougetmytext.
